summary.span: This class is used by the WMI.NET Provider Extensions framework.

span.span: This class is used by the WMI.NET Provider Extensions framework.

summary.span: It is the base class for all the management attributes that can be applied to members.

span.span: It is the base class for all the management attributes that can be applied to members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此父類別的 Name 參數可確保套用至成員的所有管理屬性都接受 Name 參數。The Name parameter of this parent class ensures that all management attributes that apply to members accept a Name parameter.
